nodes.text: VargeCorp was a manufacturing and direct-sales company that became well-known for its less-than-admirable business tactics. Aggressive marketing and franchising soon saw VargeCorp competing with other big name companies. However, although the company was successful, their products which included personal breath masks were not of the highest quality. Despite this fact, the company was successful enough to become one of the original sponsors of the Corporate Sector Authority. They were a contributing sponsor of the organization.
